name: PixelShips
description:
Hello and welcome!

This is my kind of idle or some sort of chill game called PixelShips (for now.. the name may or may not change in the future) . The concept of this game is just modern simplicity. Y'all remember when we used to play those type of games as a kids? Just simple space shooter... I wanted to do something like that! So hope you'll like it :3

For any ideas and suggestions, bugs u found contact: 

suggestonepixel@gmail.com
